# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O sdno-driver-zte-sptn-1.0.0-RC1-linux64.tar.gz https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1057/org/openo/sdno/driver-zte-sptn/standalone/1.0.0-RC1/standalone-1.0.0-RC1-linux64.tar.gz && tar -xf sdno-driver-zte-sptn-1.0.0-RC1-linux64.tar.gz && rm -f sdno-driver-zte-sptn-1.0.0-RC1-linux64.tar.gz
EXPOSE 8640
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0-RC1 autorelease-1057 > VERSION
